title: Employment notice end
h1: When does your notice period end?
p1: Tell us when you'll finish with the respondent.

noticeEnds.required: Enter your notice date. For example, 23 3 2007
noticeEnds.dayNotANumber: Day must only contain numbers. For example, 23
noticeEnds.monthNotANumber: Month must only contain numbers. For example, 04
noticeEnds.yearNotANumber: Year must only contain numbers. For example, 2012
noticeEnds.invalidDateTooFarInPast: You have entered a year which is too far in the past
